Text: Pity, it doesn't work. Crashes all the time before starting. I downloaded it three times, always the same, while the little label is still on the right-down corner of the screen. No way. It would be very nice to have it. Can't you repair it, please?
The program works! What error at start? If APPCRASH it is a singularity of your system, http://support.microsoft.com/search/default.aspx?query=APPCRASH&mode=r&catalog=LCID%3D1049
